Howard Stern calls Jay Leno a "crook" in interview Piers Morgan Tonight, the shock jock calls the NBC late-night host "insane" and accuses him of stealing sketch ideas. Jay Leno is a crook and the world knows exactly what he's up to. He steals a tremendous amount of material, The New York Post quoted Howard Stern as saying. "This guy's ripped off like 10 major things from my show." Howard Stern also adds he's baffled that Jay Leno has beaten fellow late-night host David Letterman
